page.title: 09BONAR BRIDGE HIGHLAND GAMES.
page.content: In 1888 Mr Littlejohn decided to start the{Invercharron Highland Games.}There were many events but in 1901 the biggest attraction of all the events was the{4000ft balloon jump.}In 1903 the games stopped for eighty years. The reason is unknown. In 1983 some local residents decided to start the games again. The programme included{athletics, cycling, {Highland dancing, heavy events}and {tug-o-war.}In the events many famous names appear. We also have our own Pipe Band called{Bonar Bridge/Ardgay {Pipe Band}which come and play at the games. Ullapool Junior Pipe Band also come and play. Most years the prize money adds up to around Â£3500. There are 39 trophies not counting medals to be won.
